hero.title: Find the Perfect Government Schemes for You

schemes.alert.title: AI-Powered Recommendations
schemes.alert.description: Our AI recommendation engine analyzes thousands of government schemes and matches them to your specific needs, location, and eligibility criteria. Complete the eligibility test to get highly personalized results with up to 95% accuracy.
features.title: How SchemeSavant Works

features.1.title: Smart Search
features.1.description: Our AI understands your natural language queries and finds the most relevant schemes for you.
features.2.title: Eligibility Check
features.2.description: Automatically verify your eligibility for various schemes based on your profile information.
features.3.title: Application Assistance
features.3.description: Get step-by-step guidance and document verification for your scheme applications.
cta.title: Start discovering government schemes tailored for you
cta.subtitle: Create your profile and let our AI find the perfect government schemes based on your needs and eligibility.
